price: 93. Waxayse u kala goosgoosteen diintoodii (kooxo) dhexdooda28. Xaggayagay dhammaan u soo wada noqon
arabic: وَتَقَطَّعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلٌّ إِلَيۡنَا رَٰجِعُونَ
footnotes: 28. Iyagoo noqday dariiqooyin iyo kooxo kala duwan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wataqaṭṭaʿū amrahum baynahum kullun ilaynā rājiʿūna
